item.title: decision tree
item.description: References : Reading : Tom Mitchell Lectures slides of chapter 3 Tom Mitchell, Machine Learning Chapter 3 ID3 algorithm complete solution Reddit Post Link Drive Pdf Link To Read : Chapter 3 — Decision Tree Learning — Part 1 Questions : Approximating discrete-valued fucntions robust to noisy data capable of learning disjunctive expressions search a completely expressive hypothesis space and thus avoid the difficulties of restricted hypothesis spaces.
